channel.title: Question about something related to Holyforce
channel.description: Hey when i was looking at Holyforce i wandered, what if you could make an item do the exact opposite? like what if you could make an item Heal your health. Tell me what you guys think

item.title: Question about something related to Holyforce
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

I added it and it worked fine, but it doesnt heal me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 11:07:25 PM[/size][hr]Heres what it looks like so maybe som1 can point out my error case 2968: if(playerRights >= 3) { hitDiff += misc.random(playerLevel[3]); sendMessage("you heal yourself"); } else { sendMessage("You aren't an Owner! Give it to Jared right now!"); } break;
I dont have any compile errors it just doesnt heal me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 11:20:51 PM[/size][hr]REMEMBER THAT SOURCE WHERE ON EMOTE TAB WAS HEAL OPTION? IF ANY1 HAS THAT SOURCE POST THE CODE OF IT PLEASE

Read full topic

item.title: Question about something related to Holyforce
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

IIRC, whenever you attack something hitDiff is set to a positive integer on whatever is getting attacked. That was to remove hp. Anyways IIRC there is a “setSkillLevel(int, int)” method that you could just use anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about something related to Holyforce

item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

So, where it says “attackPlayer” i add the code you have just given me?

Read full topic
item.source: Question about something related to Holyforce

item.title: Question about something related to Holyforce
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

No it wouldn’t, I’ve used that back when I had a shit server for a healing spell…hitDiff stands for hitpoints difference…when you leave it just = or make it -= it subtracts, += adds. Trust me.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about something related to Holyforce
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“LeScape, post:2, topic:185641”] hitDiff += misc.random(playerLevel[3]);
Make them really expensive and that will work out cool. Randomly heals you any number basically, could be 0 hp could be full hp.[/quote]

That would remove hp, not replace it.

Read full topic

Yeah, just add a case under the correct switch…

hitDiff += misc.random(playerLevel[3])

item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

I found an item named Druidic spell, do you think this would work to that effect? it looks almost the same as Holyforce im sure it would cooperate[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 10:51:22 PM[/size][hr]Lescape, could you post that in the format of the holyforce so i can see what it would look like? im kinda confused about where i put that part of your code in. Is it the part where it says attackPlayersWithin(451, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(444, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(341, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100); [code/]
